name: wordpress-review-bot
description: Modern WordPress plugin development setup with hot reloading

scripts.dev: concurrently "npm run watch:css" "npm run watch:js" "npm run docker:up"
scripts.build: npm run build:css && npm run build:js
scripts.wp:plugins:list: docker-compose exec wordpress wp plugin list
scripts.wp:plugin:activate: docker-compose exec wordpress wp plugin activate wordpress-review-bot
